name: Galactic Mission
description:
A game made in a week called "Galactic mission" made by a single developer.

Developers Youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/PhilDevelops

Music makers Youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCej_F29hX9ZJxQKnieDHo3A

Shop - E

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Shoot - Left Click
